title: KEDVASS INFRA
description: Since 2025 | Civil Infrastructure: Kedvass Infra is a trusted leader in government-backed civil infrastructure projects, delivering sustainable, high-quality structures that strengthen communities. With expertise in precision engineering, safety, and long-term value, we turn public infrastructure visions into lasting, reliable assets.
shortDescription: Building tomorrow's infrastructure today with innovative civil engineering solutions.

stories.title: Building Tomorrow's Infrastructure
stories.description: With over 20 years of experience in civil engineering, we have transformed landscapes and connected communities through innovative infrastructure projects across Chhattisgarh.

stories.title: Engineering Excellence
stories.description: Our team of licensed civil engineers utilizes the latest construction technology to deliver projects that meet international standards while respecting environmental guidelines.

stories.title: Proven Track Record
stories.description: 200+ successfully completed projects and a team of 150+ professionals make us the trusted choice for infrastructure development in the region.

title: NATRAJ CHEMICAL INDUSTRIES
description: Since 1983 | Black Disinfectant Manufacturer Natraj Chemical Industries produces high-quality black disinfectant phenyle, branded as ROSINOL, offering powerful hygiene solutions for homes and institutions. Known for effectiveness, safety, and freshness, our products maintain cleaner, germ-free environments every day.
shortDescription: Premium disinfectant solutions for comprehensive sanitization and hygiene.

title: EVERYDAY HYGIENIC NEED (EHN)
description: Since 2025 | Hygiene & Home Care Products EHN provides a complete range of hygiene and home care products designed to ensure cleanliness, safety, and comfort in daily life. Combining quality, innovation, and reliability, our solutions help create healthier homes and fresher living spaces.

title: KEDVASS ENTREPRENEUR
description: Since 2021 | RCC Overhead Tanks & Water Irrigation Kedvass Entrepreneur delivers government projects for RCC overhead tanks (OHT) and water irrigation systems, providing durable, efficient, and sustainable solutions. Focused on engineering precision and timely project delivery, we ensure reliable water storage and distribution for both communities and agriculture.
shortDescription: Expert water infrastructure solutions including RCC tanks and irrigation systems.

title: ADITI BOREWELLS
description: Since 2004 | Water Supply & Pipeline Infrastructure Aditi Borewells specializes in government water supply and pipeline projects, delivering efficient, sustainable, and high-quality systems that ensure safe water access for communities. Combining advanced engineering, strict quality control, and timely execution, we meet critical public water needs with excellence.
shortDescription: Comprehensive water supply and pipeline infrastructure solutions.

title: FORTUNE WITH KEDVASS
description: Since 2025 | Numerology & Vastu Consultancy Fortune With Kedvass offers expert numerology and Vastu consultancy, guiding individuals and businesses toward harmony, prosperity, and success.
